events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department to proceed with the next recruitment stages accordingly.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to ensure a smooth recruitment process and keep you updated at each step.
The initial screening of your software engineering background and skills has been successfully completed with positive feedback.
We received your prompt and enthusiastic response confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview session.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th. Please prepare to discuss your software engineering experience in detail.
You successfully completed the technical interview focusing on software development principles and problem-solving capabilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and employment terms following your technical interview success.
Your HR interview went well, with favorable discussion around role expectations and company values alignment.
An official offer has been proposed outlining your compensation package and starting date for the Software Engineer role.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your enthusiastic acceptance of the proposed role and terms.
You have officially accepted the job offer for the Software Engineer position, and we are excited to welcome you to the team.
Your onboarding process has started to provide you with all necessary resources and introductions for a smooth integration.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We look forward to your contributions to our engineering team and company success.
